name: 高等生物無機化學
restrict: ◎限本系(含雙主修)修習◎必須先修過【CMC0019  高等無機化學（一）】 ◎課程開放上修
description: To encourage students to develop insight by emphasizing the chemistry occurred in biological system and how metalloenzymes or metalloprotein function.
goals: To encourage students to develop insight by emphasizing the chemistry occurred in biological system and how metalloenzymes or metalloprotein function.
o introduce students the updated research work, and help students to think how to overcome the research challenge.
syllabus: Introduction, properities of biological molecules, electron-transfer proteins, substrate binding and activation by nonredox mechanisms, atom- and group-transfer chemistry.
prerequisite: ◎必須先修過【CMC0019  高等無機化學（一）】
